attributes.review: First of all I thought this was an app where  the 🍊 god was giving away free money, but in reality this was a scam.  After downloading this app the FBI came to my home and all they said was this quote “This is for the orange man”. They first started off with taking my couch, my sisters my little pony collection, my grandmas ashes, and it doesn’t end there. They eventually took my mom and I still don’t know how why 😭. After they abducted my mother they planted an orange tree in my front yard and then they ransacked my house and to top it all off they gave me an orange. I’m confused sad and lonely please don’t download this app unless you want your mom to be abducted and your house to be ransacked from the 🍊 servants (FBI).
attributes.title: 👁👄👁 This was a mistake

attributes.review: i see all these five star ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ rating and all that comes to mind is these wise 🧠 words from our president, ✨“FAKE NEWS”✨🤬😩 this app is awful and actually almost KILLED ME 😳🤯 white ⚪️ supremacists 🔝 came to my house 🏡 MY SUBURBAN HOUSEHOLD 😧🤭 waving confederate flags 🔴🔵⚪️ and screaming at me and my family 👱🏼‍♀️🧑🏾‍🦱🐶 to give 🍑trump’s🍑 app a five star ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ review “OR ELSE” 😳😧😭 i am beside myself about the incident 😩😤 i feel UNSAFE!! in my house!! IN AMERICA?!?! 🇱🇷 i was so astounded 😨 that our kind 💛 understanding 🥰 educated 🧠 smart 📚 wonderful POTUS 💩 would release an app of such low quality 🤔📉 i have no choice 😔 but to give this app one star ⭐️ i wish 💭 i could give it zero 0️⃣ i hope president trump understands 🧚🏼‍♀️✨⭐️😌💕🦋
attributes.title: horrible app 🤢✨🍑🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: Hey guys i only wanted to get an app that would keep me up to date on the GREATEST president in the whole WORLD! but to my appall someone had downloaded a TERRIBLE virus in this app! the app starting flashing and blaring the chinese national anthem so loudly that my hamster had a seizure 😡 and then 24 hours later the CHINESE POLICE WERE AT MY DOORSTEP accusing me of supporting a fascist racist homophobic sex offender as a president! thankfully, these comments made my conservative hamster so mad (because that statement was true and he had nothing to defend the president with 😢😢) he arose from the dead and fought off the chinese police while screaming TRUMP 2020! Anyways, totally get this craphole app if you want a virus installed on your phone.
attributes.title: app sent Chinese Police to my home😱

attributes.review: if you want to get this app because you support trump think again this app tracked my location, took pictures and videos of me while using the app and after I closed the app. An army of Donald Trump's minions aka Chester Cheetah showed up to my house and kidnapped my dog and proceeded to feed me 2020 hot Cheetos without anything to drink and covered my house in Cheeto dust and used my whole family as human sacrifices to do a demonic ritual to summon Donald Trump who feed me more hot Cheetos and filled a 10-foot tall peach with 2020 lbs of hot Cheeto dust and threw me in and closed the peach and screamed ”WHOS IN THE PEACH NOW B*TCH!” luckily I survived but I am in the hospital now with 20-degree burns from the hot Cheeto dust unable to speak with only 1 hr to live from all the hot Cheeto inhalation.
attributes.title: FATAL TO ALL TRUMP SUPPORTERS

attributes.review: as someone who’s able to vote, anyone but trump. keep america great? since when did he make it great again. i downloaded the app to stay informed for the election and continued to do my own research for this years candidates, trump has handled the pandemic terrible, has contentiously said racist remarks, has done nothing he promised he would. he has children in cages separated from there families (getting lost, and raped). here’s a list of reasons not to vote for donald trump. his sexism and sexual assault, his temperament, his business failings, his lies, his tax and charity scams, he’s mocked disability’s before. there’s many more i could name but let’s keep it as that and vote smart. not trump. also have you taken his campaign surveys he handles the questions so poorly by calling himself “president trump” and joe biden “a corrupt democrat” “a lying democrat” “a sleazy democrat” “a low energy democrat” “a low iq democrat” i mean ? he acts as if he’s 6 trying to win an argument and people want to vote him as president? i didn’t know we’re letting children run for president. dump trump.
attributes.title: not worth it

attributes.review: I honestly don’t like the idea that this app is being used to track location, and I also don’t like the idea of having to reach out it could take info from us and fellow supporters. Now I get that you guys might want to contact us I don’t think it is that necessary. And to have us PUT OUR PHONE NUMBER IN SHEESH i don’t like it btw imma Karen 😌✌️✨✨. I also don’t like how you disrespect all these different Hispanics #HISPANICLIVESMATTER and the fact you disrespect it makes me mad!

attributes.title: Great app!

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app it immediately made my phone go slower . so i originally thought maybe my phone is acting slow right now ! but then ! i restarted my phone ! and it wouldn’t turn on ! but then it did 👁👄👁 so i was like oh okkkk and i tried to delete this disgusting app but as i tried to delete it IT WOULDNT LET ME ! then i saw my camera turn on ! on my LAPTOP ! so i was like what ?! and then i heard a voice come from my laptop ! and it said “if u delete the app i’ll deport u” i was shocked and discombobulated!😩so i said “who is this ? “ and they said the FBI ! ugh if the app store doesn’t take this down then what hope is there for america ?
attributes.title: A VIRUS ?! 😣😔🙁😭😭😠😟😩😞😤😕😠🙁😤😟😤☹️😘😝🥰😕🤣👁👄👁😐☹️😠😌

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I genuinely wanted to keep up with Mr. trim but it kept crashing. No matter what app I had open my entire phone would blow up. I’ve gone through 4.5 phones and I’m getting tired of this. I just wanted to keep up with tripod but it’s becoming increasingly difficult. This app is almost as disappointing as turbio himself. He has all that money but can’t even pay someone to make him a decent app. I’m not in the mood to sue so I’m leaving this review to hopefully help some people out. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! It’s super glitchy and, like I previously stated, will cause your phone to blow up in your hands. Be careful and stay safe! 😛
attributes.title: Extremely disappointed
